Hi All!



I am trying to model am electrochromic glazing and want to analyse its impact on daylight and energy performance. I am able to see its impact on energy but not on daylight. Could anyone please help me with this one?
topic: Using electrochromic glazing in UDI analysis

Check [this](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/smart-glass-definition-for-daylighting) and [this](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/set-up-electrochromic-glass-as-dynamic-shading-group?xg_source=activity).
